trends: There have been no other sightings in Hockessin
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Witnessed starlike/teardrop object over house and car.
divs: sighting detailsfor the past 3+ months i have witnessing very bright starlike\teardrop objects over house, car and work. i know that someone from hockessin, de has witnessed the same phenonemon and has reported it on here. also, witnessed 6 weeks ago an object no more than 500-1,000 over the restaurant we were coming out of only 5 miles from my house a type of object that resembled right out of the movies the "bat plane" which had a very very high pitched sound and moved with the greatest speed i have ever witnessed. also have seen an oblong silver structure very low to the ground trailing in white steam very early in the am leaving long steam trails. i am writing to report what i witnessed last night and have been witnessing for a very long time. last night i was leaving work and this teardrop object was about 1,000 ft. above my complex. it moved very slowly along with a very large dark round object from right to left as i walked about 100 yards to my car. i then drove to the grocery store about 2 miles away and noticed it was still over me but was much lower. when i came out of the store it was still there only moved a little more to the right. i drove home about 5 miles and noticed it followed me to my house. at this point, it was as if you could reach out and touch it perhaps 1,000 ft. above as i could see the inside was lit up and it had a blue hue around the back of it. throughout the night i would go to my windows and i noticed there were about 4 of these objects not too high up and were constantly changing positions. also, there were yellow starlike objects that i see every night hovering over the treeline and staying for hours. one night last week the sky was loaded with so many of these objects that i was amazed. but they disappeared after 2 hrs. also, my dog has been very nervous and is very hesitant to go out for walks when he always would be the first one at the door. i really would like to discuss this with someone as the objects are growing and i'm seeing more and more. my family has seen these but i guess the element of unknown scares them and they make excuses. i know what i'm seeing is true and real. i do have pics on request.
